text: We'll hear argument now in Number oh oh fifteen ninety-five, Hoffman Plastic Compounds, Inc.

Yes, Your Honor, the passage of IRCA in nineteen eighty-six.
And how how w- what what relevant changes did IRCA make?
IRCA was an amendment to the INA that made the employment, the knowing employment of un- undocumented aliens unauthorized from the employer's perspective.

And and is it correct that when Sure-Tan was argued, aricka [: IRCA] if that's the way you pronounce it, was being considered by Congress and the Government in its argument told us that if aricka [: IRCA] had been passed, back pay would not be available?
